Tom Emerson wrote:
> As I've hinted in the past few weeks, I have a library under
> development in C++ that will make it easy to do this, and many other
> things, with ARC files. I hope to make a first release next week.

Would you able to give a peek beneath the veil and describe briefly what 
problems your library attacks?  In particular, are you dealing with the 
CDX and DAT formats, or just providing an access interface comparable to 
the ARCReader classes in Heritrix (about my recent troubles with which, 
more  anon)?

You mentioned earlier you were looking to integrate MySQL with your 
ARC-reader library.  Are you still doing that (and, relatedly, are you 
by any chance using any kind of database abstraction layer (e.g. ODBC) 
in the code)?

Regards,
Andy Boyko   aboy@...    Library of Congress
